channel.title: Projects on Fan-Keng Sun
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Fan-Keng Sun

item.title: AI Traffic Control System [CTCI Scholarship]
item.description: Artificial Intelligence Traffic Control System: A Deep Learning Approach to Solve Structural Traffic Jam Problem

item.title: Anime Generation by Generative Adversarial Networks
item.description: Generate anime images from given input text by the well known text-to-image synthesis method: Conditional Generative Adversarial Network (Conditional GAN).

item.title: Functionally Reduced And-Inverter Graph (FRAIG)
item.description: Implemented a special circuit representation, FRAIG, from a circuit description file, including parsing, sweeping, and circuit optimization.

item.title: High Dynamic Range (HDR) Imaging
item.description: High dynamic range (HDR) imaging from a series of photographs under various exposures using OpenCV

item.title: Image Stitching (Panorama)
item.description: Image stitching (Panorama) to form a wide-angle view of physical space using OpenCV

item.title: Physical Design for Nanometer ICs
item.description: Four stages in Physical Design: (1) Partitioning, (2) Floorplanning, (3) Legalization, and (4) Steiner-Tree Construction

item.title: Playing Against AlphaGo Zero on Raspberry Pi
item.description: Playing Against AlphaGo Zero on Raspberry Pi

item.title: Smart Equivalence Checking: Program-Building for Name Mapping
item.description: Name mapping plays an important role in verification tools because good name mapping can help verification tools efficiently and correctly verify designs.

item.title: Solving Multi-Armed Bandits by Upper Confidence Bound (UCB) Algorithms
item.description: Our survey starts from the original UCB, to improved versions (UCBV, improved-UCB), and end at the state-of-the-art method (EUCBV).

item.title: What does Deep CNN learn? Visualization of Popular Deep CNN Models
item.description: In our final project, we organize all common methods to visualize and understand CNN on the pretrained and popular AlexNet, VGG, GooLeNet and ResNet. This enables us to build up understanding of CNN, but also shows that visualization is not enough for deep CNN.
